titleStmt.title: Diuine considerations of the soule concerning the excellencie of God, and the vilenesse of man. Verie necessarie and profitable for euerie true Christian seriously looke into. By N.B. G.
titleStmt.author: Breton, Nicholas, 1545?-1626?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. A[llde] for Iohn Tappe and are to be solde at his shop on the Tower-Hill, nere the Bulwarke Gate,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop on the Tower-Hill, nere the Bulwarke Gate
